data.title: Nicolas Sarkozy Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Nicolas Sarkozy on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Nicolas Sarkozy including L'amour fou.
data.text: Nicolas Paul StÃ©phane SarkÃ¶zy de Nagy-Bocsa is a French politician who served as the president of France and co-prince of Andorra from 2007 to 2012. Born in Paris, his roots are 1/2 Hungarian Protestant, 1/4 Greek Jewish, and 1/4 French Catholic. Mayor of Neuilly-sur-Seine from 1983 to 2002, he was Minister of the Budget under Prime Minister Ãdouard Balladur during FranÃ§ois Mitterrand's second term.
